SEARCH
Package controllers

Class YoutubeController

java.lang.Object
play.mvc.Results
play.mvc.Controller
controllers.YoutubeController
All Implemented Interfaces:
play.mvc.Http.HeaderNames, play.mvc.Http.Status
public class YoutubeController extends play.mvc.Controller
Controller class for handling YouTube-related requests. This class provides methods to search for videos, get word statistics, and fetch video details.
Author:
Mohnish Mirchandani, Vatsal Dadia, Rolwyn Raju, Pretty Kotian, Elston Farel

  • Constructor Details

    • YoutubeController

      @Inject public YoutubeController(play.libs.ws.WSClient ws, WordStatsService wordStatsService, YoutubeService youtubeService, play.cache.AsyncCacheApi cache)
      Constructor for YoutubeController.
      Parameters:
      ws - The WSClient for making HTTP requests.
      wordStatsService - The WordStatsService for calculating word statistics.
      youtubeService - The YoutubeService for interacting with the YouTube API.
      cache - The AsyncCacheApi for caching responses.

      public CompletionStage<play.mvc.Result> searchVideos(String query)
      Searches for videos based on the query.
      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      A CompletionStage containing the WSResponse with search results.
